protein.specific_function: Molecular chaperone that localizes to genomic response elements in a hormone-dependent manner and disrupts receptor-mediated transcriptional activation, by promoting disassembly of transcriptional regulatory complexes.

reference.reference_text: Johnson JL, Beito TG, Krco CJ, Toft DO: Characterization of a novel 23-kilodalton protein of unactive progesterone receptor complexes. Mol Cell Biol. 1994 Mar;14(3):1956-63.
